Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package sriov-network-device-plugin is earlier than 3.6.2-2, affected by CVE-2022-41717
